name: willdurand/geocoder
description: The almost missing Geocoder PHP 5.3 library.

suggest.egeloen/http-adapter: If you are going to use any http adapters
suggest.ext-geoip: Enabling the geoip extension allows you to use the MaxMindProvider.
suggest.geoip/geoip: If you are going to use the MaxMindBinaryProvider (conflict with geoip extension).
suggest.geoip2/geoip2: If you are going to use the GeoIP2DatabaseProvider.
